blast_results module¶

blast_results.best_score_alignment(filename, from_line='', end_line='')¶

(str, str, str) -> lst

Reads the file (filename). Returns a list of lines with the alignment.

blast_results.table_dct(filename, from_line='', end_line='')¶

(str, str, str) -> lst

Reads the file (filename). Returns a dictionary of matches and their scores EValues and max idents and a list of lines with table.

e.g. {‘NC_000007.14’: (‘ Homo sapiens chromosome 7, GRCh38.p12 Primary Ass…’, {‘Score’: ‘43.7’, ‘EValue’: ‘0.83’, ‘MaxIdent’: ‘86%’})}
